attributes.action: Recognise the 1970 Great Britian Rugby League Team for their Ashes win
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the last Great Britian Rugby League team to win the Ashes series was in 1970, nearly 38 years ago.  These days in sport the national teams are recognised for their achievements with e.g.OBE's for the players.  It has been so long in rugby league since Great Britian last won the ashes, we should remember the last Great Britian squad who won the Ashes in Austrailia despite being underdogs.
